job_description:
At ZoomInfo, we encourage creativity, value innovation, demand teamwork, expect accountability and cherish results. We value your take charge, take initiative, get stuff done attitude and will help you unlock your growth potential. One great choice can change everything. Thrive with us at ZoomInfo.

In this role, you will serve as a strategic consultative partner to Executive and C-Suite stakeholders to translate business strategy into products that deliver high-quality experiences. This position requires an ability to think strategically and scale for future growth, as well as execute tactically to meet short-term goals.

You will be responsible for building and managing scalable and sustainable architecture, organizational strategy, solution designs and serve as a technical and thought leader for SAP platform in the Finance domain including order-to-cash, Record-to-Report and Procure-to-Pay functions.

As Senior Director you will be responsible for the overall design and maintenance of our SAP platform, including data architecture, feature roadmap, and integrations. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams and lead the development efforts to deliver solutions based on a deep understanding of business requirements. You will play a critical role in defining the application strategy and shaping the future of our Finance applications.

You will lead a dynamic and geographically distributed team responsible for constantly evolving the systems and processes that support our Finance and Accounting functions. Youll work closely with business leaders, partners, and our governance working group to prioritize, and align resource plans and schedules.

What You'll do:
• Establish and create the Technology and Systems roadmap (immediate and long term) for Finance Tech
• Partner with senior business leaders on their strategic roadmap, understand their operational issues and opportunities(business processes) and create technical solutions to grow business operations and ensure compliance.
• Identify and recommend creative solutions to improve business operations, business engagement and project delivery.
• Oversee the portfolio of projects, and lead projects to achieve desired goals and benefits in consideration of planned timelines and budgets.
• Manage the above applications and the product vendor relationships.
• Analyze current state needs and challenges, identify improvement and automation opportunities, portfolio planning and tool rationalization.
• Provide leadership and establish a culture that strives towards best practice and solutions excellence. Lead and develop a team with end-to-end responsibilities: engagement, analysis, design, develop, QA, support
• Represent Finance processes in technology assessments, solution design, and implementations.
• Assist IT/Engineering Org in defining and communicating organizational plans for implementing and operating financial systems.
• Work with business stakeholders to prioritize activities based on our needs, focusing on order management, billing, revenue recognition, procurement and general accounting processes.
• Develop knowledge of related business and technology capabilities to promote value.
• Oversee technical system availability, including managing patching and upgrades, security and DR scenario readiness.
• Work with business partners on prioritization and proactively anticipate gaps and overlaps within the Finance portfolio.
• Provide optimized solutions based on business needs and technology capabilities
• Serve as a solution architect for the projects and provide best practices and strategic platform direction.
• Manage Design & Delivery of products/solutions in SAP S4 HANA Finance (RAR, FICA, AP, GL & FA, RAR, BRIM)
• Stay abreast of technology trends and industry best practices and influence others to seek best-in-class solutions/technology to resolve business challenges.

What you bring:
• Bachelor's or Masters degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Business Administration or in a related field
• 15 + years of experience in architecting and designing solutions using SAP Platform
• 7+ years in a leadership position within an IT organization, with demonstrated experience driving change and improving operations
• Proven experience with designing, implementing and supporting critical business processes in Finance and HR Systems, such as Workday, Salesforce/CPQ, Netsuite, Anaplan, Coupa, Xactly; Deep understanding of Robotics Process Automation (RPA) is a plus
• Experience with audit/SOX requirements and workflows for a publicly-traded company
• Have SAP implementation experiences; Have led multiple Finance transformation initiatives.
• Deep understanding of the SAP Finance modules and business process areas Revenue Recognition, FICA, AP, FP&A, General Ledger, Fixed Assets.
• Experience partnering and communicating with teams and partners in diverse roles at all levels.
• Experience training and developing teams and being an effective coach
• Experience managing vendor relationships and ability to partner with them to conduct business and technical discovery
• Experience working and presenting proposals to executives in a clear and compelling was

The US base salary range for this position is $244,000.00 - $366,000.00 + variable compensation + benefits.

Actual compensation offered will be based on factors such as the candidates work location, qualifications, skills, experience and/or training. Your recruiter can share more information about the specific salary range for your desired work location during the hiring process.

We want our employees and their families to thrive. In addition to comprehensive benefits we offer holistic mind, body and lifestyle programs designed for overall well-being. Learn more about ZoomInfo benefits here.

About us:

ZoomInfo (NASDAQ: ZI) is the trusted go-to-market platform for businesses to find, acquire, and grow their customers. It delivers accurate, real-time data, insights, and technology to more than 35,000 companies worldwide. Businesses use ZoomInfo to increase efficiency, consolidate technology stacks, and align their sales and marketing teams all in one platform.

ZoomInfo may use a software-based assessment as part of the recruitment process. More information about this tool, including the results of the most recent bias audit, is available here.

ZoomInfo is proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunities for applicants and employees regardless of sex, race, age, color, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, disability status, religion, protected military or veteran status, medical condition, or any other characteristic or status protected by applicable law. At ZoomInfo, we also consider qualified candidates with criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.
